  • Method Details

    • isBalancedPassword

      protected boolean isBalancedPassword()
      in a for loop we push the brackets we find and pop the bracket if we find the closing bracket. If brackets are not balanced stack will be not empty
      Returns:
      true if passwords brackets are balanced

    • isPalindromePossible

      protected boolean isPalindromePossible(boolean oddexists, int lettercount, int letter, int search, String pass1)
      a palindrome can only have 1 letter in odd number. other letters should be in an even number. This function counts letters and if we have 2 different letter with odd amount returns false
      Parameters:
      oddexists - this boolean is to keep if we have odd number of a letter
      lettercount - counts amount of the letter we are currently searching. When we search different letter it turns back to 1 because we take the letter we will search from sentence this means we have at least 1 letter
      letter - is index of letter we search and count. when it hits end of the sentence recursion stops
      search - is the iterator we move around stringg
      pass1 - is the modified string
      Returns:
      true if sentence can be a palindrome

    • withoutparantheses

      protected String withoutparantheses()
      Returns:
      password without brackets

    • checkIfValidPassword

      boolean checkIfValidPassword(int calltime, int brecketcount)
      function checks what characters are with ascii values
      Parameters:
      calltime - is counter of amount of time we called the function. Should be 0 in begining
      calltime -
      Returns:
      true if password only contains letters and at least has length 8 and 2 brackets
